Articles.Content: Speaking of missing features - has any content creator demonstrated, say, resource management for packed/unloaded craft, or a burn at x10+ warp, or a maneuver execution from tracking station scene, without loading/switching to the craft first? IIRC, devs made it a big deal years ago. It's basically a prerequisite for a lot of missing stuff. Is it implemented at all? What state is it in?

4 minutes ago, J.Random said:

a burn at x10+ warp

I recall one of them doing this, but I don't remember which. Only caveat to it is you can't adjust throttle mid-timewarp
